resources.string:
• 2 cups ground Egusi (melon seeds)
• 1 cup palm oil
• 1-2 lbs assorted meat (beef, goat meat, cow tripe)
• 1-2 pieces fish (stockfish or dried fish)
• 1/4 cup ground crayfish
• 1 large onion, chopped
• 2 cups fresh spinach or bitter leaves, chopped
• 1-2 Scotch bonnet or habanero peppers, chopped
• 2 bell peppers, chopped (optional)
• 2 tomatoes, chopped (optional)
• 2 stock cubes (Maggi or Knorr)
• Salt to taste
• Water or meat stock as needed
• 1-2 tablespoons locust beans (iru or ogiri, optional)

• 1-2 tablespoons locust beans (iru or ogiri, optional)
